about.headline: Your steady HR presence when it matters most
about.body:
Dominique Thomas is a senior Human Resources leader with over 15 years of experience advising organizations in complex and regulated environments. She has partnered with more than 100 companies across industries and growth stages, supporting leaders in building people infrastructure that enables growth while managing risk.

Her expertise spans HR compliance, employee relations, employee benefits, leave of absence administration, talent management, and HR operations. Dominique is known for translating complex requirements into practical systems through HRIS implementations, operating frameworks, and decision support tools that improve consistency and judgment across organizations.

A significant focus of her work is developing HR capability. She has led and mentored HR professionals from Generalist through Director levels, designing competency models, learning and development programs, and mentorship structures that strengthen leadership effectiveness and scalability.

Dominique holds dual certifications as a SHRM SCP and SPHR professional. She earned a Master’s degree in Human Resources Development and a Master’s in Business Administration from Claremont Graduate University, and a Bachelor’s degree in Strategic and Organizational Communication from Temple University.

She works with business and HR leaders who value clarity, rigor, and experienced judgment when decisions carry meaningful consequences.
